title: Rapid Results: How the Postal Service Delivered Millions of COVID-19 Test Kits
description: In this episode, we are joined by the Postal Service's Chief Information Officer and Executive Vice President, and the Vice President of Engineering Systems to discuss the vital role the Postal Service played in the rapid delivery of millions of test kits. We'll learn more about the preparation, logistic details, and technical solutions the Postal Service implemented that ensured a successful delivery operation. We’ll also talk about the skilled workforce that came together to make this possible and the lasting impacts of this success on the organization!
author: mediacenter@usps.gov (United States Postal Service)
content:encoded: In this episode, we are joined by the Postal Service's Chief Information Officer and Executive Vice President, and the Vice President of Engineering Systems to discuss the vital role the Postal Service played in the rapid delivery of millions of test kits. We'll learn more about the preparation, logistic details, and technical solutions the Postal Service implemented that ensured a successful delivery operation. We’ll also talk about the skilled workforce that came together to make this possible and the lasting impacts of this success on the organization!
itunes:title: Rapid Results: How the Postal Service Delivered Millions of COVID-19 Test Kits
itunes:author: United States Postal Service
itunes:summary: This week on Mailin' It, we are joined by Pritha Mehra, the Postal Service’s Chief Information Officer and Executive Vice President, and Linda Malone, our Vice President of Engineering Systems, to get the inside scoop on the test kit delivery operation. Join us as we’ll learn more about the operation logistics, its technical infrastructure, and the communication implemented to ensure successful test kit delivery to millions of homes across the nation.
itunes:subtitle: This week on Mailin' It, we are joined by Pritha Mehra, the Postal Service’s Chief Information Officer and Executive Vice President, and Linda Malone, our Vice President of Engineering Systems, to get the inside scoop on the test kit delivery operation. Join us as we’ll learn more about the operation logistics, its technical infrastructure, and the communication implemented to ensure successful test kit delivery to millions of homes across the nation.
itunes:keywords: shipping, covid, kitting, packages, usps, mail, kits, covid-19, logistics, postal service, informed delivery
